title: 이달의소녀탐구 #494 (LOONA TV #494)
summary:
0:01 -- Some members are recording themselves with the LTV camera and the backlight is an issue.
Lip: "Yves, you are too bad at keeping us all in one frame." Yves: "Why don't you hold it? Kim Lip has an experience of holding the camera upside down (LTV #156)".
0:22 -- JinSoul whines about how Lip takes up more than half of the frame.
0:27 -- She changes the angle all of a sudden and everyone is visible.
0:37 -- The full group photoshoot takes place.
